messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

unable to receive mails from specific domain sent thursday very urgent must be solved best today importance high hello unfortunately get mails his wrote already twice but get least get shown also find him junk folder how does come need solve urgently because cannot communicate with him arrange meetings etc need really solved sales responsible communicate with him best if somebody could call need get solved by tomorrow regards
